title: Judah’s Fall Begins
summary: After Josiah’s death, his successors rebel against Babylon. Nebuchadnezzar invades, and many people are taken into exile. King Jehoiachin is captured, and Zedekiah becomes a puppet king under Babylon’s control.

faq.question: What happened to Jehoiachin?
faq.answer: He was taken to Babylon along with treasures from the temple and palace.

faq.question: Who became king after Jehoiachin?
faq.answer: Zedekiah, who ruled under Babylon’s authority.
